_sText:
This is Balilla soccer game. 

To play just press glass button:

-to move players, press forward-backward
----------------------
-to kick ball, press attack
--------------------------

------------------------------
------------------------------
TO INSTALLATION

Save the .bsp file in your game directory:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\*YOURACCOUNT*\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps


email: collezionista2009@live.it

HAVE FUN! :D
